channel.title: Romain Barissat on Romain Barissat
channel.description: Recent content in Romain Barissat on Romain Barissat

item.title: About
item.description:
In a nutshell

I thrive to always research until I find the best solution to a given problem. This led me to an extensive knowledge and experience in many fields such as Marketing, User Experience, Software Engineering and DevOps.

I love software

I am developer and power user, I eat software for breakfast and have signed up to so many web apps and forums that I always forget I have an account there - Big thanks to my password manager, I couldn’t have done it without you!

I am always hanging around ProductHunt, AppSumo, IndieHackers, HackerNews, Reddit, etc. stalking for the latest exciting stuff!

I love other stuff too!

I am a proud husband, dad, son, elder brother, uncle, godfather.

I love the Ocean and the Sea, so you will often find me underwater as I practice diving, free diving, snorkeling, spearfishing, photography. That’s why I currently live in Phuket, Thailand.

More

Please check out my LinkedIn profile if you want to know more about me.
